article.title: Status and history for [uzn_cyrl]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: Many corrections thanks to Miikka-Markus Alhonen.
Article 14 was a single para, two sentences. Split those as the two clauses.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
